title: Modify FFI client methods to avoid task spawning
body:
FFI client methods now use `try_send` on the async channel, and immediately return an error if there is insufficient capacity to enqueue a request.

This is a proposed fix to https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/135

Also: 

1) Update dependencies and fix the CI that broke due to Github action/runner changes.
2) Add build and FFI packaging for `aarch64-apple-darwn`.

title: Fix master task shutdown
body: Fixes https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/120

title: Ability to disable server name checking in TLS client
body: This feature can be activated by setting the `allow_server_name_wildcards` flag in TlsClientConfig to `true` in the bindings.

title: Share TLS configuration
body: Share common TLS verifier/PEM code with DNP3 from util crates.

title: Runtime shutdown with optional timeout
body:
External: Adds the ability to shut down the runtime with an optional timeout.

Internal: Refactoring to support new versions of oo-bindgen and drop-safe promises.

title: Use 100% dependencies from crates.io
body: This will allow publishing of the core `rodbus` crate onto crates.io as well.

title: Add MUSL .SO targets
body:
- Adds MUSL Linux targets to the CI for x64, ARM64, and ARMv6.
- Migrate to `oo_bindgen` 0.5.0 which packages C/C++ distributions using a single ZIP.
- Modify CI to select packaged libs for each language using a config file

title: Enable full LTO for release builds
body: There doesn't appear to be any downsides other than build time. Resulting library and perf binary are smaller and performance tests show a speedup on Windows/Linux.

title: Externalize tokio-ffi oo_bindgen model and implementation
body: This allows sharing the oo_bindgen model for Tokio with other protocols, i.e. DNP3

title: Externalize tracing-ffi-schema
body: Moves the shared FFI model for tracing to an external crate.

title: Use common (de)serialization routines with DNP3 via external crate
body: Use [scursor](https://github.com/stepfunc/scursor) read and write cursors to share code with DNP3.

title: enable TCP_NODELAY for client and server sockets
body: Modbus always writes full MBAPs, Nagle's algorithm should always be disabled to reduce possible latency.

title: parameterize the perf test based on time not total number of requests
Serial retry strategy
body:
* Rename `ReconnectStrategy` to `RetryStrategy` in Rust
* Use a `RetryStrategy` instead of a single timeout for RTU mode client and server

title: Fault-tolerant RTU server
body:
The RTU server now opens the port on the Tokio task. It will retry at a configurable rate. If the port fails while running, it will retry to open the port after the delay.

This change was motivated by the fact that people use USB dongles that can be added/removed at will.

title: refactor CI bom/licenses
body: Refactor how licenses/bom works as well

title: make tokio-serial an optional dependency for the core crate
body:
Makes serial optional in rodbus in addition to TLS.

Makes serial and TLS optional when compiling the FFI and JNI libraries.

title: TCP/TLS server address filter
body: Implements https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/79

title: `ClientState` callbacks
body: The TCP part of https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/77

title: Channel enable/disable
body: Adds the ability to enable and disable communication channels without removing them. Channels start disabled.

title: Reset TCP connection logic after a successful connection
body: Fixes https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/82

title: Feature/tls server without authz
body:
Implements https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/78.

Adds separate methods for creating TLS servers with and without an authorization handler.

title: Bug/#74
body:
Fixes https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/74.

Removes non-spawning functions from the public Rust API and uses `Runtime::enter` instead.

title: Remove tokio-test
body: Removes the weird re-exporting previously required by `tokio-mock`. Instead, depend on `tokio` directly and use `tokio_test::` macro to run most tests on a real runtime.  Create an external crate called `tokio-mock-io` that doesn't have the problems that the ones in `tokio-test` have.

title: Refactor/request completion
body:
It was previously possible for the request callbacks not to be called under certain conditions, including if an error occurred while writing the request to the physical layer.

This PR refactors how callbacks are completed to **ensure** callbacks fire:

1) Error callbacks are always completed in one location
2) Even if the Task itself is dropped due to Runtime shutdown or Task panic, the callback will now occur in a Drop implementation.

title: Client read while Idle
body:
Fixes https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/70

Also improves/consolidates the logging when client/server sessions are closed.

title: Refactor/new jni gen
body: Changes how the JNI library is built, allowing x64 and ARM64 to be built in the cross matrix.

title: Resolve host names on client
body: Use separate host/port arguments on client and server.

title: Bug/tx log order
body:
This resolves: 

https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/62

Also includes a ton of internal refactoring to remove unnecessary  heap buffers and trait boxing. Reduces internal complexity.

title: Feature/dynamic log level
body:
Adds the ability to set the log level on `Channel` and `Server`.

Closes https://github.com/stepfunc/rodbus/issues/61

title: precompute the CRC lookup table as a constant
body: This is how the CRC crate intended it to be used.  The library was computing the CRC table before every calculation!

title: Add Windows 32-bit support.
body: See https://github.com/stepfunc/oo_bindgen/issues/85

title: Add feature flag for TLS support.
Add MacOS builds in the CI.
body: See https://github.com/stepfunc/oo_bindgen/issues/82.

title: Documentation update.
body: See https://github.com/stepfunc/oo_bindgen/pull/80.

title: RTU support
body:
- [x] Serial/RTU support
- [x] Broadcast support for the server
- [x] Bindings
- [x] Documentation

title: Add Modbus Security (TLS) support
body: Fix #23.
